scripts.bundle: webpack && cd docs-src && npx webpack && cd ..
scripts.sloc: echo "Source code:" > SLOC && npx sloc src >> SLOC && echo "Tests:" >> SLOC && npx sloc tests >> SLOC && echo "Total:" >> SLOC && npx sloc src tests >> SLOC
scripts.doc: npx markdown-toc -i --maxdepth 4 README.md && npx jsdoc2md --no-gfm src/parser/parseChord.js src/renderer/chordRendererFactory.js> API.md
scripts.outdated: npm outdated && cd docs-src && npm outdated && cd ..
scripts.audit: npm audit && cd docs-src && npm audit && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run bundle && npm run sloc && npm run doc && npm run outdated && npm run audit
